item.title: Germanyâ€™s auto giants were already reeling. Now Trump wants to turn them into American companies
item.description: For Germany, the prospect of U.S. tariffs on European autos comes at a time when it's top original equipment manufacturers (OEMs) are already reeling.

item.title: Super Micro slides 8% after stock is dropped from Nasdaq 100
item.description: Super Micro is exiting the Nasdaq 100 after just five months in the index.

item.title: Trump loses bid to toss New York hush money conviction on immunity claim
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump was convicted of 34 felony counts of falsifying business records related to a hush money payment to porn star Stormy Dani...

item.title: S&P 500 to reach as high as 7,400, as boom similar to 1995-2000 plays out, says strategist Mary Ann Bartels
item.description: The buyside chief investment strategist believes advancements from technology can drive the market higher in 2025.

item.title: Trump meets with TikTok CEO as company asks Supreme Court to block ban on app
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump told reporters, "I have a warm spot in my heart for TikTok."
